SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
 0=> "0000001111000001",
 1=> "0000000000001001",
 2=> "1111100100000000",
 3=> "1111100100000000",
 4=> "1111100100000000",
 5=> "1111100100000000",
 6=> "1111100100000000",
 7=> "0000001111000000",
 8=> "0000000000001000",
 9=> "0000001111000010",
 10=> "0000000000000010",
 11=> "1111100000000000",
 12=> "0000011111000011",
 13=> "0000000000000000",
 OTHERS => X"0000"
);
